intro.description:
One of the reasons to use an application like uDig is to access all the great free geospatial information available on the web.
This section covers the use of Web Map Servers (WMS) which make available layers of information that you can mix into your own maps.

item.title: Web View
item.description:
We are going to make use of the WMS published on the uDig site.
Change to the Web view by clicking Window > Show View > Web .

item.title: Load Service
item.description:
Click on the link WMS:dm solutions to load the service.
From the Resource Selection page we are going to check the following layers: Elevation/Bathymetry, Parks and Cities
Press Finish to add these layers to your map.
